00019 InternalMessageProcessorTest::setInternalQueueTest()
00020 {

00023     InternalMessageProcessor* processor = new InternalMessageProcessor(queue,
00024                                                                        NULL,

00030 
00031 void
00032 InternalMessageProcessorTest::runTest()
00033 {
00034     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00035     InternalMessageProcessor* processor = new InternalMessageProcessor(queue,
00036                                                                        NULL,
00037                                                                        NULL,
00038                                                                        NULL);
00039     pthread_t processorThread;
00040     
00041     pthread_create(&processorThread, NULL, runProcessor, (void*) processor);
00042 
00043     // Wait a bit for the run to get processed
00044     sleep(1);
00045     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(processor != NULL);
00046 
00047     // This run should return immediately
00048     processor->run();
00049     
00050     processor->shutdown();
00051 }
00052 
00053 void
00054 InternalMessageProcessorTest::processItemTest()
00055 {
00056     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00057     InternalMessageProcessor* processor = new InternalMessageProcessor(queue,
00058                                                                        NULL,
00059                                                                        NULL,
00060                                                                        NULL);
00061     pthread_t processorThread;
00062 
00063     pthread_create(&processorThread, NULL, runProcessor, (void*) processor);
00064 
00065     // Wait a bit for the run to get processed
00066     sleep(1);
00067     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(processor != NULL);
00068 
00069     // Add an item to the queue for the processor to grab
00070     queueItem *item = new queueItem();
00071     item->methodId = 1;
00072     
00073     queue->addItem(0, item);
00074 
00075     // Let it get processed
00076     sleep(1);
00077     
00078     // Verify the item is no longer in the queue
00079     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(queue->getItemQueue(0).size() == 0);
00080 
00081     // The item should have caused shutdown, so we shouldn't be
00082     // blocking here
00083 }
00084 
00085 void*
00086 runProcessor(void *arg)
00087 {
00088     InternalMessageProcessor* processor;
00089     processor = (InternalMessageProcessor *) arg;
00090     processor->run();
00091 }
